name: CTIA-THE WIRELESS ASSOCIATION, petitioner, v. CITY OF BERKELEY, CALIFORNIA, et al.
name_abbreviation: Ctia-The Wireless Ass'n v. City of Berkeley

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
CTIA-THE WIRELESS ASSOCIATION, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF BERKELEY, CALIFORNIA, et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of National Institute of Family and Life Advocates v. Becerra, 585 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 2361, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018).
casebody.head_matter:
CTIA-THE WIRELESS ASSOCIATION, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF BERKELEY, CALIFORNIA, et al.
No. 17-976.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 28, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of National Institute of Family and Life Advocates v. Becerra, 585 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 2361, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018).
